articles.title: Combined value of top 75 Indian brands rebound 35% to $393 billion, TCS leads the pack - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The total value of top 75 Indian brands had dropped by six percent in 2020 versus 2019 due to slowdown in the brand value of companies in the banking and automotive categories.
articles.content: The top 75 brands in India have rebounded to a combined worth of $393 billion, averaging a 35 percent compounded annual growth rate (CAGR) since 2020, when the pandemic struck, driving their value to… [+3937 chars]
